content:
To support long-running calls, Salesforce provides Apex Continuations. If your OmniScript calls a long-running Integration Procedure or Apex class, you can enable continuation.

For OmniScripts that call long-running Integration Procedures, check the Use Continuation setting in the Integration Procedure Action.

For OmniScripts that call Apex classes using Remote Actions, you have two options:

* Make a Long-Running Remote Call Using VlocityContinuationIntegration (deprecated)
* Make a Long-Running Remote Call Using OmniStudio.OmniContinuation (recommended)

Vlocity supports the use of the Salesforce Continuation object for long-running remote calls. Use the VlocityOpenInterface2 interface and VlocityContinuationIntegration class to support normal Remote Calls and Remote Calls that use the Continuation Object.

Note: For new Apex classes, do not use VlocityOpenInterface.
title: Continuation in Long-Running Calls
